advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: Advanced tools and utilities for power users

rebuildEmbeddings.title: üîÑ Rebuild Embeddings
rebuildEmbeddings.description: Rebuild vector embeddings for your content. Use this when switching embedding models or fixing corrupted embeddings.

rebuildMode.label: Rebuild Mode
rebuildMode.existingDesc: Re-embed only items that already have embeddings (faster, for model switching)
rebuildMode.allDesc: Re-embed existing items + create embeddings for items without any (slower, comprehensive)

errors.selectOne: Please select at least one item type to rebuild

rebuildEmbeddings.runningNote: You can leave this page as this will run in the background

systemInfo.title: System Information
systemInfo.unableToCheck: Unable to check for updates. GitHub may be unreachable.

addModelForm.title: Add {type} Model
addModelForm.description: Configure a new {type} model from available providers.
addModelForm.azureNote: For Azure, use the deployment name as the model name

defaults.title: Default Model Assignments
defaults.description: Configure which models to use for different purposes across CSBKMS
defaults.missingRequired: Missing required models: {list}. CSBKMS may not function properly without these.

default_transformation_model.label: Transformation Model
default_transformation_model.description: Used for summaries, insights, and transformations

default_tools_model.label: Tools Model
default_tools_model.description: Used for function calling - OpenAI or Anthropic recommended

large_context_model.label: Large Context Model
large_context_model.description: Used for processing large documents - Gemini recommended

default_embedding_model.label: Embedding Model
default_embedding_model.description: Used for semantic search and vector embeddings

providers.title: AI Providers
providers.description: Configure providers through environment variables to enable their models.

empty.tryDifferent: Try using a different notebook name.
empty.archivedNoMatch: No archived notebooks match your search
empty.archivedTryDifferent: Modify your search to find archived notebooks.
empty.defaultDescription: Start by creating your first notebook to organize your research.

confirmDelete.title: Delete Notebook
confirmDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone and will delete all sources, notes, and chat sessions.

empty.title: No notes yet
empty.description: Create your first note to capture insights and observations.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Note
deleteConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this note? This action cannot be undone.

empty.title: No sources yet
empty.description: Add your first source to start building your knowledge base.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Source
deleteConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this source? This action cannot be undone.

removeConfirm.title: Remove Source from Notebook
removeConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to remove this source from the notebook? The source itself will not be deleted.

podcast.title: Podcasts
podcast.description: Keep track of generated episodes and manage reusable templates.

episodes.title: Episodes
episodes.overviewDescription: Monitor podcast generation jobs and review the final artefacts.
episodes.runningDescription: Episodes that are actively generating assets.
episodes.pendingDescription: Submitted episodes waiting to start processing.
episodes.completedDescription: Ready to review, download, or publish.
episodes.failedDescription: Episodes that encountered issues during generation.

messages.failedToLoadDescription: We could not fetch the latest podcast episodes. Try again shortly.
messages.noEpisodes: No podcast episodes yet. Generate your first one from the notebook or source chat interfaces.
